citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: GIS.GIS.BC_ADDRESS_FOR_VIEW_WGS84

descript.abstract: Buncombe Address data re-project to wgs 84 for testing mobile 311 applicaiton. the application needs a geocoding service setup in wgs84. The Geocode locator needs source data in the geographic projection you want the data in. for now the 311 app cannot handle the project on the fly, at later date it shouldl so no maintenance is necassary, we can delete this after testing
descript.purpose: Buncombe Address data re-project to wgs 84 for testing mobile 311 applicaiton. the application needs a geocoding service setup in wgs84. The Geocode locator needs source data in the geographic projection you want the data in. for now the 311 app cannot handle the project on the fly, at later date it shouldl so no maintenance is necassary, we can delete this after testing

idinfo.useconst: Only for testing Mobile 311 in wgs84 no maintence planned.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
